chunks.text: In this video, we will know what are the forms and what is the input tag in the form
Using the form is an important element of websites
because you submit data from client to server through the form
These are the forms which you see on contact pages, google forms or enquiry forms
The details of the flight or railway ticket, date and time, where to go and where to go
are submitted through the HTML forms
In the last video, very few people liked it
I will request you to like this video with high energy
so that we can maintain high energy throughout the course
So let's go to the computer screen and see the forms, input tags and some best practices
